evidence: Worker queue drains with `shift()` in loops over cloned arrays.
impact: Queue throughput degrades with large item counts due to O(n) removals.
recommendation: Use index/ring-buffer or pop-based strategy for O(1) dequeue.

evidence: Memory list path reads all keys then `Promise.all` reads all values.
impact: Cold reads can saturate I/O and heap on large memory stores.
recommendation: Batch reads with bounded concurrency and incremental pagination.

evidence: Search ignores keyword index and scans lowercase content for all entries.
impact: Memory search remains O(n) as store grows.
recommendation: Use keyword index candidate narrowing before substring checks.

evidence: Storage list performs full-tree glob scan and sort for each list call.
impact: Prefix list requests pay global directory walk and sorting overhead.
recommendation: Walk scoped prefixes or keep key index cache to avoid full scans.

evidence: Auth discovery fetches run sequentially with per-endpoint timeout.
impact: Slow providers can delay startup/config load by multiple seconds.
recommendation: Parallelize well-known fetches with bounded concurrency.

evidence: Per-directory command/agent/mode/plugin loaders run serial scans.
impact: Multiple `.lobster` roots amplify startup I/O latency.
recommendation: Run loaders in parallel or unify into single directory pass.
